projectPurpose: To provide a simple, fast, and efficient desktop utility for translating text selected by the user.
platforms: Desktop (Implied cross-platform support via Rust, e.g., Windows, macOS, Linux)

alternatives.name: DeepL Translator
mainFeatures: Translate selected text via hotkey (Desktop apps)

marketPositioning: Tran positions itself as a minimalist, fast, and open-source desktop tool singularly focused on providing quick translations of selected text. It competes with more feature-rich open-source alternatives and the broader ecosystems of commercial giants like Google and DeepL by offering a lightweight, dedicated solution for users who prioritize speed and simplicity for on-the-fly text lookups on their desktop.
